New Records: Klay Thompson set a franchise record with 11 three-pointers in his Dallas Mavericks debut
Key Match Events: Dallas Mavericks secured a victory over the San Antonio Spurs in their season opener
Post-Match Reflections: The Dallas Mavericks' win marked the team's first game under head coach Jason Kidd
Klay Thompson's performance was a key factor in the team's success
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was notable for Thompson's historic debut and the Mavericks' strong performance from the perimeter
